Name: Issue 292
Introduction: Welcome back to another Weekly Xamarin. As always lots of great articles to keep you up to date with the happenings in the Xamarin Community. Have a great weekend, and stay safe. ❤ Kym

Articles.Title: Introduction to Xamarin Forms Design
Articles.Description: Xamarin Forms allows us a great deal of control over UI design. Get acquainted with page types, layout and graphic controls.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Styling the Android bottom tabs animation behavior and font
Articles.Description: Steven looks at some lessons learnt trying to tame the Android tabs behavior in a Xamarin.Forms project.
Articles.Author: Steven Thewissen

Articles.Title: XAML Naming Conventions
Articles.Description: As developers we know that naming things is hard. In this post, Charlin covers naming and consistency guidelines for your XAML.
Articles.Author: Charlin Agramonte

Articles.Title: Animated Entry in Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: This blog post discusses creating an animated Entry control that reacts to focus event changes. When the entry is focused, it animates its priority. Once it loses focus, it is reset.
Articles.Author: Patrick T

Articles.Title: Using The Touch Effect in Xamarin Community Toolkit
Articles.Description: In this post Andrei shows you how you can use the TouchEffect in Xamarin Community Toolkit!
Articles.Author: Andrei Misiukevich

Articles.Title: Plugin.ValidationRules 1.2 is here!
Articles.Description: Luis updates the ValidationRules plugin Nuget with new features like ValueChagned, ValidateCommand and ValueFormatter.
Articles.Author: Luis Matos

Articles.Title: Introduction to the Xamarin.CommunityToolkit
Articles.Description: The Xamarin.CommunityToolkit complements Xamarin.Forms 5 perfectly with all kinds of commonly found behaviors, converters and effects, but also houses complete new controls like CameraView and TabView. While waiting for .NET MAUI, this will be your new best friend.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Customizable Tabs
Articles.Description: With the TabView in the Xamarin Community Toolkit you gain a fully customizable tab bar for your Xamarin.Forms app. Swipe to change tabs, background colors, badges, different styling for selected state, top or bottom placement and much more! All you can do without any custom renderers and on any platform.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Clearing Selection of CollectionView
Articles.Description: CollectionView supports single and multiple item selection modes. Sometimes after selecting items, the user may want to clear all selections and start afresh.
Articles.Author: David Ortinau

Articles.Title: Awesome Scroll Effects in Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: Everyone likes a good parallax scroll effect, right? That's a good start. You can also use behaviors, converters, and data triggers to add other animation effects and transitions to your UI. Xamanimation is a library that leverages all the built-in APIs of Xamarin.Forms to make complex animations with ease.
Articles.Author: David Ortinau

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict 236: Supporting Your Customers
Articles.Description: Customer support is hard to do right, and app support is even harder. How do you get your users to contact you with proper information before they give you that 1 star review. We discuss our journey into improving our support system in our mobile apps.
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict

Articles.Title: Xamarin: The Community behind the Framework
Articles.Description: Community member Andres Pineda joins the panel to talk about Xamarin and its outstanding community of passionate developers.
Articles.Author: dotNet Youtube Channel

Articles.Title: Null Pointers 35: Multimedia on Mobile
Articles.Description: Multimedia is all around us! We can’t think of a single app that does not have some form of multimedia: images, sounds or even videos. We don’t even notice anymore! But how hard is it to use it in your own app? Find out all about it in this episode!
Articles.Author: Null Pointers
